title: Will placements be based off of your season 7 ending rank or the ranked reset rank?
body: The title says it all. I got placed somewhere in bronze at the "end" of season 7, and the ranked reset ended me at silver 5. Will I be based off of the bronze ranked I ended at in season 7 or the ranked reset silver 5?

replies.body: It's a soft reset, which will take your previous rank into consideration.  Everything is shuffling down though, so everyone is going to place in a lower division/tier.
So, would I be right in assuming i'm placing bronze (I had a mmr level of silver 4, placed silver 5 ranked reset, somewhere in bronze (II or I) at the end of season)
